name: Vineglimmer Snarl
oracle_text:
As Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Forest or Island card from your hand. If you don't, Vineglimmer Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

name: Shineshadow Snarl
oracle_text:
As Shineshadow Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Plains or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, Shineshadow Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

name: Necroblossom Snarl
oracle_text:
As Necroblossom Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Necroblossom Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

name: Furycalm Snarl
oracle_text:
As Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

name: Frostboil Snarl
oracle_text:
As Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

name: Valentin, Dean of the Vein // Lisette, Dean of the Root
type_line: Legendary Creature — Vampire Warlock // Legendary Creature — Human Druid

card_faces.name: Valentin, Dean of the Vein
card_faces.oracle_text:
Menace, lifelink
If a nontoken creature an opponent controls would die, exile it instead. When you do, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."

card_faces.name: Lisette, Dean of the Root
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and those creatures gain trample until end of turn.

name: Uvilda, Dean of Perfection // Nassari, Dean of Expression
type_line: Legendary Creature — Djinn Wizard // Legendary Creature — Efreet Shaman

card_faces.name: Uvilda, Dean of Perfection
card_faces.oracle_text: {T}: You may exile an instant or sorcery card from your hand and put three hone counters on it. It gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this card is exiled, remove a hone counter from it" and "When the last hone counter is removed from this card, if it's exiled, you may cast it. It costs {4} less to cast this way."

card_faces.name: Nassari, Dean of Expression
card_faces.oracle_text:
At the begging of your upkeep, exile the top card of each opponent's library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards, and you many spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on Nassari, Dean of Expression.

name: Shaile, Dean of Radiance // Embrose, Dean of Shadow
type_line: Legendary Creature — Bird Cleric // Legendary Creature — Human Warlock

card_faces.name: Shaile, Dean of Radiance
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that entered the battlefield under your control this turn.

card_faces.name: Embrose, Dean of Shadow
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature, then Embrose, Dean of Shadow deals 2 damage to that creature.
Whenever a creature you control wit ha +1/+1 counter on it dies, draw a card.

name: Plargg, Dean of Chaos // Augusta, Dean of Order
type_line: Legendary Creature — Orc Shaman // Legendary Creature — Human Cleric

card_faces.name: Plargg, Dean of Chaos
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
{4}{R}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegenday, nonland card with mana value 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card_faces.name: Augusta, Dean of Order
card_faces.oracle_text:
Other tapped creatures you control get +1/+0.
Other untapped creatures you control get +0/+1.
Whenever you attack, untap each creature you control, then tap any number of creatures you control.

name: Kianne, Dean fo Substance // Imbraham, Dean of Theory
type_line: Legendary Creature — Elf Druid // Legendary Creature — Bird Wizard

card_faces.name: Kianne, Dean fo Substance
card_faces.oracle_text: {T}: Exile the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put a study counter on it.

card_faces.name: Imbraham, Dean of Theory
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
{X}{U}{U}, {T}: Exile the top X cards of your library and put a study counter on each of them. Then you may put a card you own in exile with a study counter on it into your hand.

name: Star Pupil
oracle_text:
Star Pupil enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
When Star Pupil dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
flavor_text: "When I'm done here, they'll name entire buildings after me."

name: Chaos Warp
oracle_text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Be careful when handling old magical trinkets. You never know who they've been."
—Agusta, Lorehold dean

name: Doom Blade
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text:
"An angel can shine like the sun, inspire the weak, and even threaten victory over darkness. But in the end it matters not, for it still dies like any other pest."
—Ob Nixilis

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text:
"Shatter your opponent's spell with enough force, and you'll shatter their confidence with it."
—*Tome of Obstructions*, marginalia

name: Adventurous Impulse
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"Her quest began as all quests do, with one small step in an unexpected direction."
—*The Explorer's Testament*

name: Despark
oracle_text: Exile target permanent with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
"A tale of a tyrant being humiliated and losing all his power? I'm inspired already!"
—Killian, Silverquill mage-student

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text:
"Thus, Bruk the Skyhammer earned his epithet and won the war, all in fiery moment."
—*Compendium of Warspells*

name: Uvilda, Dean of Perfection // Nassari, Dean of Expression
type_line: Legendary Creature — Djinn Wizard // Legendary Creature — Efreet Shaman

card_faces.name: Uvilda, Dean of Perfection
card_faces.oracle_text: {T}: You may exile an instant or sorcery card from your hand and put three hone counters on it. It gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this card is exiled, remove a hone counter from it" and "When the last hone counter is removed from this card, if it's exiled, you may cast it. It costs {4} less to cast this way."

card_faces.name: Nassari, Dean of Expression
card_faces.oracle_text:
At the begging of your upkeep, exile the top card of each opponent's library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards, and you many spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on Nassari, Dean of Expression.

name: Day of Judgment
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures.
flavor_text:
"This must not become common knowledge. The consequences of such a spell are too great. Lock it away in the restricted archive, and destroy its record in the catalog."
—Director Taiva, to Isabough

name: Blue Sun's Zenith
oracle_text: Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Five suns! Can you even imagine how complicated the orbital calculations must be? What I wouldn't give to tackle an equation like that!"
—Zimone, Quandrix mage-student

name: Sign in Blood
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"It's always my brightest students who make the worst decisions."
—Shaile, Silverquill dean

name: Snakeskin Veil
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"Never reject the kindness of a serpent. It will not be offered twice."
—Druidic manuscript fragment

name: Shock
oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Expanded Anatomy
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Changing the equation from incremental to exponential was a stroke of genius on my part."

name: First Day of Class
oracle_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it gains haste until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: Introduction to Annihilation
oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller draws a card.
flavor_text:
"I've never seen a student fail quite so spectacularly. There's potential in that."
—Hostram, professor of arcanochemistry

name: Introduction to Prophecy
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw a card.
flavor_text: Final grades are posted on the first day of class.

name: Abundant Harvest
oracle_text: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text:
"One need not know the specific details of a spell to suppress its effect. Simply arrange the rules of the reality within which the spell operates."
—Imbraham, Quandrix dean

name: Strategic Planning
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"I can offer only information, young one. What path you choose is up to you."
—Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios

card_faces.name: Torrent Sculptor
card_faces.oracle_text:
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
When Torrent Sculptor enters the battlefield, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on Torrent Sculptor equal to half that card's mana value, rounded up.

card_faces.name: Flamethrower Sonata
card_faces.oracle_text: Discard a card, then draw a card. When you discard an instant or sorcery card this way, Flamethrower Sonata deals damage equal to that card's mana value to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
card_faces.flavor_text: He channels his heart's passion into every fiery note.

oracle_text:
Flying
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
flavor_text: Form and function in perfect unity.

name: Adrix and Nev, Twincasters
oracle_text:
Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
If one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

name: Teferi's Protection
oracle_text:
Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)
Exile Teferi's Protection.

name: Crux of Fate
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

name: Memory Lapse
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Where do our forgotten thoughts go? I knew once, but I can't remember."
—Director Taiva, journal entry

name: Thrill of Possibility
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"If the prospect of what could be doesn't electrify you to your core, why attend Strixhaven at all?"
—Nassari, Prismari dean

name: Primal Command
oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Target player gains 7 life.
• Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library.
• Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
• Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Revitalize
oracle_text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Knight Kathryn closed her eyes, bracing herself for the end. When she opened them again, she stood triumphant over her foe."
—Thadus the Healer, *Memoirs*

name: Electrolyze
oracle_text:
Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"The hydraulic power grip was a failure, but the gauntlets were a shocking success."
—Journal of the Prime Izmagnus

name: Harmonize
oracle_text: Draw three cards.
flavor_text:
"The bloody din of invasion faded
And silent song rang through the woods again."
—"Song of Freyalise"

name: Putrefy
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"From monarch to mulch as quick as could be."
—_The Dethroner's Grimoire_

name: Ephemerate
oracle_text:
Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Defiant Strike
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"For twelve days and twelve nights, Somat assailed the monster's shell. On the thirteenth morning, it cracked with the dawn."
—_Heroics: A Book of Fables_

name: Mind's Desire
oracle_text:
Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
